cluster_information.name: Alarm Base
cluster_information.description: This cluster is a base cluster from which clusters for particular alarms for a device type can be derived. Each derivation SHALL define the values for the AlarmBitmap data type used in this cluster. Each derivation SHALL define which alarms are latched.

derived_datatypes.name: AlarmBitmap
derived_datatypes.description: Bitmap data type with values defined by the derived cluster. The meaning of each bit position SHALL be consistent for all attributes in a derived cluster.

parameters.name: Alarms
parameters.description: Bitmap where each bit set corresponds to an alarm that should be reset

parameters.name: Mask
parameters.description: Bitmap where each bit set corresponds to an alarm that should be enabled (1) or suppressed (0)

attributes.name: Mask
attributes.description: Bitmap where each bit set corresponds to an alarm that shall be enabled

attributes.name: Latch
attributes.description: Bitmap where each bit set indicates that the corresponding alarm will be latched when set and requires explicit reset

attributes.name: State
attributes.description: Bitmap where each bit represents the state of an alarm. True means active, false means inactive

attributes.name: Supported
attributes.description: Bitmap where each bit represents whether an alarm is supported. True means supported, false means not supported

features.name: Reset
features.description: Supports the ability to reset alarms
